DOC.brief_summary: Since docosahexaenoic acid ( DHA ) level sperm membrane show decreased asthenozoospermic men , investigator hypothesize DHA supplementation may improve . Furthermore , investigator add vitamin E protect unsaturated bond susceptible oxidation production free oxygen radical .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Administration Combined Docosahexaenoic Acid Vitamin E Supplements Spermatogram Seminal Plasma Oxidative Stress Infertile Men With Asthenozoospermia
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Willing participate study fill informed consent form infertile ( conception 12 month intercourse without contraception ) age 2045 y.o , idiopathic asthenospermia accord WHO criteria normal hormonal profile Exclusion criterion : infection genitourinary ( GU ) tract anatomical abnormality GU tract chronic disease last 3 month surgery GU tract consumption omega3 fatty acid and/or vitamin E supplement last 3 month
